text: Spy is a 2015 American action comedy spy movie directed by Paul Feig. This movie is about a CIA analyst, Susan Cooper. She goes undercover in the world of a deadly arms dealer to prevent a global disaster. Melissa McCarthy plays Susan Cooper. Allison Janney plays Elaine Crocker. The movie was released on June 5, 2015 in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2015 action movies Category:2015 comedy movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s spy movies Category:American spy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ben Falcone Category:Spy comedy movies Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Spy (2015 movie)
